doc.title: Epic 2 Phase Breakdown
doc.snippet: Phase 1 validates OpenAPI contract with mock data before BuildingMOTIF. Story 2.5 integrates TypeScript client with Designer app using hierarchical templates and bulk save patterns.

doc.title: Design OpenAPI Specification
doc.snippet: Python code uses snake_case internally, JSON API uses camelCase via Pydantic serialization_alias. URN identifiers use 'id' field name. Hierarchical template structure embeds all relationships.

doc.title: Generate TypeScript Client
doc.snippet: Uses @hey-api/openapi-ts to generate type-safe client with 5 functions (TemplatesService, MappingsService, SpacesService). Respects camelCase from Pydantic aliases.

doc.title: Implement Mock Endpoints
doc.snippet: All 5 endpoints return static hierarchical data. No actual storage. Validates OpenAPI contract before BuildingMOTIF integration in Phase 2.

doc.title: Coding Standards
doc.snippet: Use React Query for data fetching. Prefer functional components with hooks. Follow error handling patterns with retry logic.

doc.title: Designer App Documentation
doc.snippet: QueryClient configured for data fetching patterns. Use useQuery for reads, useMutation for writes with cache invalidation.

constraints.constraint: Use generated TypeScript client functions (getTemplatesApiV1223pTemplatesGet, getMappingsApiV1223pMappingsGet, etc.) - do not create manual fetch calls
All hooks must use React Query (useQuery for reads, useMutation for writes)
Implement error handling with retry: 3 logic in all queries
Use camelCase field names matching Pydantic aliases (equipmentTypeId, deviceTypeId, propertyId, spaceId)
URN identifiers use 'id' field name, not 'urn'
Hierarchical template structure - no separate device/property queries needed
Bulk save pattern - single mutation replaces all mappings, no individual CRUD
Delete old Epic 1 services - do not leave unused code
Keep useAISuggestionQuery unchanged - Designer-only, not FastAPI-backed
Cache invalidation on mutations - use queryClient.invalidateQueries with specific query keys
Project-relative paths only in context files - strip /Users/amol/Documents/ai-projects/bms-supervisor-controller prefix
Follow TDD principle - write tests first, then implement (from CLAUDE.md)
No comments unless explaining WHY (from CLAUDE.md)
Dynamic dropdown filtering - device dropdown disabled until equipment selected, property dropdown disabled until device selected
Reset child selections when parent changes - changing equipment type resets device and property, changing device resets property
Remove mockValidationService - hierarchical template filtering prevents invalid combinations
Bulk save for all mutations - create adds to array, delete filters from array, both use single saveMappings mutation
UI components must handle loading and error states from React Query hooks

tests.standards: Use Jest with React Testing Library for component and hook tests. Test hooks with @testing-library/react-hooks patterns. Mock external API calls. Follow TDD: write tests first, then implement. Test files colocated with source (*.spec.ts, *.spec.tsx). Run with: pnpm test
